src:
¿Y no encontraron bots a favor del discurso presidencial?: Páez | Entérate
 by Redacción AN / AL



Carlos Páez, director de Mesura, se mostró sorprendido de que en el informe de redes presentado por la Secretaría de Seguridad Ciudadana, no encontraron automatismos a favor del presidente López Obrador, por lo que calificó el "estudio" como superficial y poco explicado.
text:
And they didn't find bots in favor of the presidential speech ?: Páez | Find out
 by AN / AL Writing



Carlos Páez, director of Mesura, was surprised that in the network report presented by the Secretariat of Citizen Security, they did not find automatisms in favor of President López Obrador, so he described the "study" as superficial and poorly explained.
